item.title: Bridget add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I think that we're all mentally ill. Those of us outside the asylums only hide it a little better - and maybe not all that much better after all." -- Stephen King

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Hippocrates
item.description: "Wherever the art of Medicine is loved, there is also a love of Humanity. " -- Hippocrates

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I don't want to die without any scars." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Bridget add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "But all night, Aslan and the Moon gazed upon each other with joyful and unblinking eyes." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Bridget add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "When Aslan Bears his teeth winter meets its death. When he shakes his mane, we shall have spring again." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Brendan Behan
item.description: "They took away our land, our language, and our religion; but they could never harness our tongues..." -- Brendan Behan

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "I always thought insanity would be a dark, bitter feeling, but it is drenching and delicious if you really roll around in it." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "You is kind. You is smart. You is important." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "Ever morning, until you dead in the ground, you gone have to make this decision. You gone have to ask yourself, "Am I gone believe what them fools say about me today?" -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Bridget add a quote by Gillian Flynn
item.description: "The face you give the world tells the world how to treat you." -- Gillian Flynn
